Package org.daisy.dotify.formatter.impl.obfl Description

Provides functionality for creating a Formatter from a OBFL.

Provides an ObflParserFactoryService implementation, ObflParserFactoryImpl, and an ExpressionFactory implementation, ExpressionFactoryImpl.

IMPORTANT: This package contains implementations that should only be accessed using the Java SPI or OSGi. Additional classes in this package should only be used by the implementations herein.
